content:
I don’t really like blogging as a concept. My reaction is due to the tech world inisiting every engineer should be blogging and how you should feel bad if you dont. I’m a fairly private person with little to no online presence.
Despite this I’ve wanted to blog for a few years. As a side effect, I’m pretty guilty for sending my friends walls of text about my diehard feelings on various tech topics. They reply suggesting I start a blog - I suspect as a coping mechanism.
Theres a few reasons I feel apprehensive about blogging:
 I don’t feel like my writing skills are up to task. I’m not sure if my ideas are interesting enough for an entire lengthy post. It feels hipster and a bit look at me. I’m affraid that I’ll stop and people will see a blog thats clearly failed. Bloggers seems obsessed with making money.  For me it all comes down to motivation. I’ll blog only when I have something interesting to say. There wont be a regular schedule but when I do post I hope its interesting.
